meanings.definition: To make a copy of something.
meanings.sent1: She recopies the important notes to keep them safe.
meanings.sent2: He recopies the document to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The student recopies the math problems for practice.
meanings.sent4: The artist recopies the painting to sell multiple versions.
meanings.sent5: Recopying the map helps him remember the directions better.

meanings.definition: A written list of ingredients and instructions for preparing a particular dish.
meanings.sent1: The chef follows the recopies to make the perfect cake.
meanings.sent2: She lost the recopies for the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The recopies in the cookbook inspire her to try new recipes.
meanings.sent4: His collection of recopies is a treasure trove of culinary delights.
meanings.sent5: The handwritten recopies from grandma are cherished family heirlooms.
